name: Zombie Killer - Pocket Edition
description:
Zombie killer is a pixel style shooting game.
Gameplay is fairly simple, the player needs to shoot in front of the paper zombies coming constantly.
Players every shooting zombies randomly for coins or grenades,of course,you also need to keep calm aimed all the zombies at the road!
In order to prevent out of ammunition, and so you fight is the only way, is your only hope of live ammunition.
When a zombie high melee attacks by slashing, damage but freaky fatal to you! Don't be taken lightly!

Game Features:
Simple operation, frank to reach full time!
Variety of regional operations!Rich switch weapons, changeful props reward!
Epic sound critical points, take headphones, feel the explosion and plasma symphony!
Two arbitrary switching combat mode, fight hundred release your potential!
